subject: The Skinny: Friday May 11, 2007
body:

Meet Michelle Obama 
Is it too early in the presidential campaign to start focusing 
      attention on the candidates' spouses? If the candidate is Barack Obama, 
      the answer, apparently, is no. 
And Hollywood kicks the 
      smoking habit.
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
